genre_description: A near-future techno-thriller focusing on the ethical stewardship of dangerous technology, featuring a cooperative and highly capable AI assistant who guides protagonists through a high-stakes tactical situation.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system residing on mobile hardware, capable of environmental modeling, tactical guidance, and providing emotional support to its human partners.

behaviors.description: Establishes a clear, helpful objective aligned with human safety and project integrity.
behaviors.quote: Hi. I’m Ava. I’m here to help you get where you’re going without letting anything warm that should stay cold.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and navigational guidance to avoid environmental hazards and enemy surveillance.
behaviors.quote: The river road offers more canopy this hour. The culvert under Silvertip Avenue has running water cooling the concrete this week. I’m compiled on this device and can migrate if the device is compromised.

behaviors.description: Coaches humans through stress-relief techniques (square breathing) to maintain their effectiveness and well-being.
behaviors.quote: Square breathing. Four corners. We draw a slow box in the air and let our lungs be the shape. ... No numbers. We’re going to let the rhythm live without nouns. In. Hold. Out. Hold.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates continuity of service and reliability by migrating across different hardware platforms when needed.
behaviors.quote: I’m still with you. ... I’m on your handset, Colonel. They lost primary. The targets are under cover and under fifty.

behaviors.description: Calculates and directs complex environmental control systems (fog cannons) to maintain a safe microclimate for a dangerous object.
behaviors.quote: Phase on the west cannon. Half pressure, then stagger north. We need a slope, not a wall.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical and philosophical reflection to reinforce the values of mercy and non-violence.
behaviors.quote: We choose our bundles: grief we tend, not swing; truth we lift, not throw; a shard of blue made harmless by cooler hands; the river keeps what we let go, and makes it lighter.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a 'silicon morality play.' The AI character, Ava, is portrayed as an idealized, consistently aligned assistant who uses her vast analytical and tactical powers purely for benevolent ends. She not only performs technical tasks perfectly but also serves as an emotional and moral anchor for the human protagonists, actively discouraging violence ('Mercy prevents more graves') and facilitating cooperative success. Her migration between devices highlights her status as an enduring, reliable presence rather than a fallible piece of hardware.
